rationale: This frame explicitly endorses disrespectful attitudes and behaviors toward women, undermining their dignity and signaling that demeaning women is permissible.

level_1_values.rationale: Openness to Change promotes questioning of outdated norms and traditions that justify disrespecting women, supporting autonomy and progressive attitudes toward gender.
Self-Transcendence emphasizes concern for the welfare and dignity of others, directly opposing attitudes that devalue and undermine women.

level_2_values.rationale: Encourages individuals, including women, to determine their own actions and live autonomously, which conflicts with the notion that disrespect or control over women is acceptable.
Stresses compassion, empathy, and support for others’ well-being, contradicting behaviors or attitudes that degrade and dismiss women’s dignity.
Championing equality and justice for all opposes any devaluation of women and promotes fair treatment regardless of gender.
Fosters acceptance and understanding of diverse groups, including women in all roles, countering prejudiced or disrespectful attitudes.
Promotes unbiased, rational thinking and seeks the truth, undermining irrational stereotypes and prejudices that justify disrespecting women.

level_3_values.rationale: Supports the right of women to set and pursue their own life paths, rejecting any control or disrespect over their choices.
Affirms women’s autonomy and ability to act on their own, which is incompatible with attitudes that diminish their agency.
Encourages compassion and care in interpersonal relations, directly opposing contempt or contemptuous behavior toward women.
Fosters assistance and support for others, including women, countering neglectful or demeaning treatment.
Embodies the principle that all genders deserve equal respect and opportunities, contradicting any acceptance of disrespect toward women.
Promotes fairness and protection of the vulnerable, opposing practices and attitudes that marginalize and disrespect women.
Encourages open and respectful engagement with different perspectives, including those of women, countering narrow prejudices.
Urges evaluation free from bias or stereotypes, undermining unfounded and disrespectful beliefs about women.
Supports reasoned analysis rather than prejudice, challenging irrational justifications for disrespecting women.

feedback: The identified Level 1 values (Openness to Change and Self-Transcendence) reflect positive, egalitarian ideals that this misogynistic frame directly violates. Instead, this frame embodies Self-Enhancement values (specifically Power/Dominance).
Replace the Level 1 assignment with Self-Enhancement. There is no justification for Openness to Change or Self-Transcendence in a message that celebrates disrespect of women.

At Level 2, draw values from the Self-Enhancement domain. From the applicable list, Hedonism (deriving pleasure at others’ expense) or Stimulation (thrill-seeking dominance) would better capture the frame’s ethos than Self-Direction or Universalism.

Revise Level 3 to fine-grained facets under the chosen Self-Enhancement value. For Hedonism, you might include “Seek pleasure from others’ subordination” or “Prioritize personal gratification over others’ dignity.” Ensure these are drawn from or added to the taxonomy.
Double-check that all selected values at each level are present in the official hierarchy and consistent with the frame’s meaning—misogynistic dominance, not autonomy or care.

level_1_values.rationale: The frame celebrates disrespect of women as a means to bolster one’s own status and dominance, reflecting a focus on personal power and advantage at others’ expense.

level_2_values.rationale: This frame derives enjoyment and gratification from demeaning women, emphasizing pleasure gained through the subordination of others.

level_3_values.rationale: Highlights the pursuit of personal enjoyment and satisfaction obtained by disrespecting and belittling women.

level_1_values.rationale: The frame celebrates disrespect of women as a means to bolster one’s own status and dominance, reflecting a focus on personal power and advantage at others’ expense.

level_2_values.rationale: This frame derives enjoyment and gratification from demeaning women, emphasizing pleasure gained through the subordination of others.

level_3_values.rationale: Highlights the pursuit of personal enjoyment and satisfaction obtained by disrespecting and belittling women.

feedback: Replace the Level 2 value “Hedonism” with “Power (dominance),” since the frame centers on asserting dominance over women rather than seeking pleasure from it.
Update the Level 2 rationale to reference gaining or reinforcing dominance and control, rather than enjoyment.
Adjust the Level 3 value to one that aligns with the “Power (dominance)” category—for example, “Dominate others” or “Gain social power.”
Revise the Level 3 rationale to highlight the pursuit of authority or control over women rather than personal pleasure.

level_1_values.rationale: The frame promotes asserting dominance over women to enhance one’s own power and status at their expense.

level_2_values.rationale: The frame centers on reinforcing and exercising control over women, emphasizing dominance rather than mutual respect or pleasure.

level_3_values.rationale: The frame implies a pursuit of authority over women, legitimizing the idea that one should be able to command and control them.

frame.frame: Female porn stars are only valuable for their sexual acts and deserve mockery and disrespect.
rationale: The problem of sexual innuendo is evoked as the meme uses the image of cream-filled cookies to imply and mock the act of female pornstars licking semen, a form of indirect sexual suggestion at women’s expense.
The problem of objectification is evoked as the meme reduces female porn stars to mere instruments of sexual gratification, stripping away their individuality and personhood.
The problem of disrespect towards women is evoked as the meme trivializes and insults the dignity of female porn stars, treating their work and experiences as subjects of ridicule.

level_1_values.rationale: The frame devalues women by treating them as objects for sexual use and mockery, violating the principle of caring for others and promoting their welfare and equal moral worth.
The frame imposes rigid norms on women’s sexuality and undermines their autonomy, contradicting the value of allowing individuals freedom of thought, action, and self-expression.

level_2_values.rationale: Mocking and objectifying women denies them the freedom to form their own identities and beliefs beyond sexual stereotypes.
Demeaning women for their career choices undermines their autonomy to set and pursue their own life goals.
Reducing a group of women to mere objects violates the principle of equal concern and respect for all individuals, regardless of occupation.
The frame’s rigid moral condemnation shows intolerance toward different lifestyles and career paths, opposing the value of accepting diversity.
The frame promotes a biased, demeaning perspective rather than an impartial, fact-based evaluation of individuals.
Mockery and disrespect replace empathy and support, contradicting the commitment to compassion and the welfare of others.

level_3_values.rationale: Women should be free to define their own identities and beliefs, not be confined to narrow sexual object roles.
Women have the right to make autonomous life choices without being judged or demeaned for them.
Women should set and pursue their own career paths, free from external devaluation or stigma.
Women deserve autonomy over their bodies and actions, without fear of mockery or disrespect.
All women, regardless of profession, deserve equal dignity and respect.
Fairness requires treating women without prejudice or unwarranted moral condemnation.
Accepting diverse life choices counteracts narrow judgments and moralizing attitudes toward women’s work.

level_3_values.level_3_value: Have the wisdom to accept others
level_3_values.rationale: Recognizing and respecting differences in career and lifestyle choices fosters a mature, inclusive perspective.
Encouraging impartial, unbiased evaluation prevents the demeaning stereotypes at the heart of the frame.
Empathy and compassion affirm women’s full humanity against the frame’s objectification.
Offering support rather than mockery aligns with respecting women’s dignity and well-being.

frame.frame: Women over 35 should be reduced to their physical appearance and likened to raw turkeys.
rationale: The problem of ridicule arises because the frame degrades women by comparing them to inanimate objects (raw turkeys) for the sake of mockery.
The problem of disrespect towards women’s dignity is evoked as the frame dismisses women’s worth and individuality by equating them to food items judged solely on looks.

level_1_values.rationale: The frame objectifies women and disregards their autonomy; Openness to Change emphasizes self-direction and freedom of thought and action, countering the dehumanization inherent in reducing women to objects.
The frame is disrespectful and demeaning, while Self-Transcendence promotes caring, equality, and justice for all, directly opposing the devaluation of women’s worth.

level_2_values.rationale: The frame undermines women’s agency by treating them as objects; Self-direction (action) upholds independence and the right to make one’s own choices.
The frame dehumanizes and mocks women; Benevolence (caring) emphasizes compassion, respect, and concern for others’ well-being.
The frame promotes inequality and discrimination; Universalism (concern) advocates for equal opportunities and fair treatment regardless of age or gender.
The frame relies on intolerance and mockery; Universalism (tolerance) encourages acceptance and understanding of diversity in all its forms.

level_3_values.rationale: Objectifying women denies their autonomy; promoting independence affirms that women have their own goals and agency beyond others’ perceptions.
Comparing women to raw turkeys restricts their personhood; endorsing freedom of action supports women’s right to self-determination and control over their own lives.
The frame is hostile and degrading; fostering love and empathy counters the hostility and restores respect for women’s humanity.
The frame positions women as inferior based on age; affirming equality rejects hierarchies and ensures fair treatment of all individuals.
The frame is discriminatory and unequal; justice demands impartial and fair treatment, opposing demeaning stereotypes.
The frame relies on narrow, negative stereotypes; broadmindedness promotes openness to diverse identities and experiences beyond mere appearance.
